history.content:
Hi anon-

Feel free to email one of us directly since this seems to be a problem specific to your record. You can contact me at svannostrand@eecs.berkeley.edu.  FWIW, SIS seems to include the term you're about to enroll in as a term in attendance, so it should include Fall 16 (seems like you already figured this out, but just in case I'm mis-reading.)

Thanks,

Sarah

children.subject: Original poster here. It seems that CalCentral has modified their interface so that the number of "terms in attendance" is no longer displayed. I guess that resolves the issue for now.

history.content:
Under CalCentral > My Academics > Profile, I see that I have 7 "terms in attendance" at UCB. However, this is incorrect because I've only been at UCB for 6 semesters (which includes Fall 2016).

Should I contact SIS about this?
Does anyone else have the issue of incorrect number of terms in attendance?
history.subject: Incorrect Terms in Attendance
